ARABIC: قَالَ رَبِّ لِمَ حَشَرْتَنِىٓ أَعْمَىٰ وَقَدْ كُنتُ بَصِيرًا

ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_0: He will say, 'My Lord, why have you gathered me blind when before I was able to see?'
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_1: He will ask: "O Lord, why have you raised me blind when I was able to see?"
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_2: where-upon he will say: "Lord! Why have You raised me blind when I had sight in the world?"
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_3: He will say, "My Lord, why have you brought me back to life blind; before I could see?"
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_4: He will say, “O my Lord, why have You raised me blind, whereas I was sighted?”
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_5: He will say: "O my Lord! Why have you raised me up blind, while I had sight (before)."
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_6: He shall say: My Lord! why hast Thou raised me blind and I was a seeing one indeed?
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_7: He shall say, 'O my Lord, why hast thou raised me blind, and I was wont to see?'
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_8: He will say: My Lord! Wherefor hast Thou gathered me (hither) blind, when I was wont to see?
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_9: and he will ask, "Lord, why have You raised me up blind, while I possessed sight before?"
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_10: He will say: O my Lord! why hast Thou gathered me sightless whereas surely I have been a seer.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_11: He will say, ‘My Lord! Why have You raised me blind, though I used to see?’
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_12: He will say: "O my Lord! why hast Thou raised me up blind, while I had sight (before)?"
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_13: He will say:"O my Lord! Why have you raised me up blind, while I had sight (before)."
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_14: My Lord' he will say: 'why have You raised me blind when I was able to see'
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_15: He will say, “My Lord, why did You raise me blind, though I was seeing?”
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_16: He will say, "My Lord, why have you raised me blind while I was [once] seeing?"
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_17: [20:125] He shall say, ‘My Lord, why have you brought be to the assembly blind, though I used to see?’, in the world and at the raising from the grave?
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_18: He will say: My Lord!) O my Lord! (Wherefore hast Thou gathered me (hither) blind, when I was wont to see) in the life of this world?
